app_descript:
ABC ‚Äì Stream Full Episodes & Live TV

Brief: Immerse yourself in the world of ABC shows with the official ABC app and revel in an extensive selection of full episodes, classic throwbacks, and live TV. From hit dramas to beloved comedies, access your favorites and discover new cornerstones of entertainment directly from your Android device.

Core Features:

  • üé• Stream Full Episodes: Watch the latest from shows like 'Station 19', 'General Hospital', and come back for more as the library updates with additional content.
  • üì∫ LIVE TV Access: Get your daily fix with 'Good Morning America', catch the nightly news and don't miss out on special events like 'The Oscars¬Æ'.
  • üîÑ No Sign-In Binge Watching: Dive into seasons of timeless classics such as 'Body of Proof', 'Army Wives', and 'Felicity' without needing to sign in.
  • ‚≠ê ABC Account: Create your free account to save favorites, resume playback across devices, and tailor your viewing experience.
  • üõ†Ô∏è Feedback & Assistance: Reach out directly through the app's feedback form or access more information at the official support pages.

Pros:

  • üë§ Personalized Experience: Your ABC account saves your preferences and watches history for a custom-tailored viewing journey.
  • üîÑ Cross-Device Synchronization: Seamlessly pick up where you left off on any supported Android device.
  • üëÅÔ∏è Variety of Content: From live TV to a vast archive of shows, the ABC app keeps you entertained with a diverse range of genres and eras.
  • üÜì Free Classic Shows: Enjoy a treasure trove of throwbacks without the need for a subscription or sign-in.

Cons:

  • üîí Full Episodes Require TV Provider: The latest full episodes are locked behind a participating TV provider account.
  • ‚öôÔ∏è Limited Live Stream Access: The live TV feature is only available with a participating TV provider in selective U.S. cities.
  • üì≤ Ads and Targeting: The app includes third-party and Disney family advertising, with targeted ads based on user interests.
  • üìâ Usage Data: App features Nielsen's measurement software, contributing to market research which some users might find intrusive.

Price:

  • üíµ The app is free to download with advertising. Full access to the most recent episodes requires a participating TV provider account.

This app is a gateway to an array of ABC's televised content, offering something for every taste. Whether you are tuning in for a live event or indulging in past favorites, ABC provides a comprehensive suite of options for TV enthusiasts on the move.
